info.name: XUL ### Tabs: compacted & contextual color
info.description:
Features:
  • Each tab has its own style according to its state: "loaded, unloaded, active, unactive, visited, unread".
  • Save space, the tabs bar is thinner.
  • Fully compliant with australis default style
  • Compatible with some useful addons: "Classic Theme Restorer" & its app button, "TabMixPlus", "UnloadTab".
Although the style is compliant with other tab addons, you may have to turn off their features that change the tabs appearance. Otherwise, you may not get the desired result as shown in screenshot.
info.additionalInfo:
If you want to customize the bamboo tab, here is an example that you can add to this style or to a dedicated one: /* bamboo */ .tabbrowser-tab[visibleLabel="Bamboo"]:not([selected]) { background-color:transparent !important; background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(125,185,232,0.8) 0%, rgba(78,136,193,0.8) 50%, rgba(31,88,154,0.5) 100%) !important; } .tabbrowser-tab[visibleLabel="Bamboo"] .tab-text { color:yellow !important; font-weight:bold !important; text-shadow: 0 0 1px red, 0 0 1px red, 0 0 1px red, 0 0 2px red, 0 0 2px red, 0 0 2px red!important; }
